name: Trip Tracking Report
query:
SELECT 
    `t0`.`name` AS "Trip ID:Link/Trip:120",
    `t0`.`truck` AS "Truck:Link/Truck:120",
    `t0`.`customer` AS "Customer:Link/Customer:150",
    `t0`.`workflow_state` AS "Status:Data:100",
    `t0`.`current_trip_milestone` AS "Current Milestone:Data:150",
    `t0`.`current_milestone_comment` AS "Milestone Comment:Data:200",
    `t0`.`updated_on` AS "Last Updated:Date:120"
FROM `tabTrip` AS `t0`
WHERE `t0`.`workflow_state` != 'Closed'
ORDER BY `t0`.`updated_on` DESC;
